insertAfter.xpath: //item[ not (substring(@name, string-length(@name) - string-length('Blueprint') + 1) = 'Blueprint') and ( (starts-with(@name,'meleeToolAxe')) or (starts-with(@name,'ulmMeleeBlade')) or (starts-with(@name,'meleeWpnBlade')) or (starts-with(@name,'meleeWpnKnuckles')) or (starts-with(@name,'ulmMeleeKnuckles')) or (starts-with(@name,'ulmMeleePolearm')) ) ]/effect_group/passive_effect[ (@operation='base_set') and (@name='BlockRange') ]
